article.title: General Atomics to Support Universal Ground Control System and Data Terminal
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: General Atomics Aeronautical Systems Inc., Poway, Calif., was awarded an $11,716,130 fixed-price-incentive contract modification to procure logistics support for the Universal Ground Control System and Universal Ground Data Terminal. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Ala., is the contracting activity.
